vote.title: Authorize (1) the Dallas Police Department to receive and deposit funds in the amount of $600,000.00 from various federal, state, and local law enforcement agencies to participate in investigations, receive reimbursements, share asset forfeitures, and set out operational procedures as requested for various task forces including, but not limited to those shown (list attached to the Agenda Information Sheet) for reimbursement of overtime for investigative services for FY 2023-24; (2) a City contribution of Federal Insurance Contributions Act costs in the amount of $8,700.00; (3) an increase in appropriations in an amount not to exceed $600,000.00 in the Various Task Force Fund; and (4) execution of the agreements - Total not to exceed $608,700.00 - Financing: General Fund ($8,700.00) (subject to appropriations) and Various Task Force Fund ($600,000.00)
vote.description: Authorize (1) the Dallas Police Department to receive and deposit funds in the amount of $600,000.00 from various federal, state, and local law enforcement agencies to participate in investigations, receive reimbursements, share asset forfeitures, and set out operational procedures as requested for various task forces including, but not limited to those shown (list attached to the Agenda Information Sheet) for reimbursement of overtime for investigative services for FY 2023-24; (2) a City contribution of Federal Insurance Contributions Act costs in the amount of $8,700.00; (3) an increase in appropriations in an amount not to exceed $600,000.00 in the Various Task Force Fund; and (4) execution of the agreements - Total not to exceed $608,700.00 - Financing: General Fund ($8,700.00) (subject to appropriations) and Various Task Force Fund ($600,000.00)
